Class DepthTouchInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.papart.multitouch.TouchInput
      • fr.inria.papart.multitouch.DepthTouchInput

  • public class DepthTouchInput
extends TouchInput
    Touch input, using a depth camera device.

    jeremylaviole - laviole@rea.lity.tech
